W

Widget - Class in com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget
The Widget API is a part of the Smart Extension API's Some of our advanced accessories will support the Widget API.
Widget.Intents - Interface in com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget
Intents sent between Widget Extensions and Accessory Host Applications.
WIDGET_API_VERSION - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration.Registration.ApiRegistrationColumns
API version.
WIDGET_API_VERSION - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration.Registration.HostAppColumns
API version.
WIDGET_ENTER_NEXT_LEVEL_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
This intent may be used by the Widget Extension as a response to a Widget.Intents.WIDGET_ONTOUCH_INTENT.
WIDGET_IMAGE_HEIGHT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration.Registration.DeviceColumns
The height of the widget image TYPE: INTEGER (int) PRESENCE: OPTIONAL
WIDGET_IMAGE_UPDATE_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent used by the Widget Extension whenever it wants to update its widget image.
WIDGET_IMAGE_WIDTH - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration.Registration.DeviceColumns
The width of the widget image TYPE: INTEGER (int) PRESENCE: OPTIONAL
WIDGET_OBJECT_CLICK_EVENT_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Host Application to the Widget Extension whenever an click event is detected on a graphical object referenced from a layout.
WIDGET_ONTOUCH_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Host Application to the Widget Extension whenever a user interacts with the Widget image.
WIDGET_PROCESS_LAYOUT_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Extension whenever it wants to update the Accessory display by sending an XML layout.
WIDGET_REFRESH_RATE - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration.Registration.HostAppColumns
The maximum supported widget refresh rate TYPE: INTEGER (int) PRESENCE: OPTIONAL
WIDGET_SEND_IMAGE_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Widget extension whenever it wants to update an image in an ImageView on the accessory.
WIDGET_SEND_TEXT_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Widget extension whenever it wants to update a text in a TextView on the accessory.
WIDGET_START_REFRESH_IMAGE_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Accessory Host Application whenever it wants the Widget to start update it's Widget image.
WIDGET_STOP_REFRESH_IMAGE_INTENT - Static variable in interface com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget.Widget.Intents
Intent sent by the Accessory Host Application whenever it wants the Widget to stop/pause update it's Widget image.
